name: 謝東儒
objective: 本課程是計算機圖學之應用延伸課程，著重於電腦動畫之程式設計技術。主題包含物理動畫原理、骨架、關鍵格、逆運動學、動作捕捉、粒子系統等等。
schedule:
Introduction
Interpolating Values
Interpolation-Based Animation
Kinematic Linkages
Motion Capture
Physically Based Animation
Fluids: Liquids and Gases
Modeling and Animating Human Figures
Facial Animation
Behavioral Animation
Special Models for Animation
scorePolicy:
Programming Assignment
Class Participating
Oral Presentations
Final Project
materials: Computer Animation, Algorithms and Techniques  (Third Edition), Parent, Rick 2012
